name: HMTrigger
desc: An abstract base class for triggering actions based on a set of conditions.

items.name: func updateName(String, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Updates the name of the trigger.

items.name: func enable(Bool, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Changes the enabled state of the trigger.

items.name: var lastFireDate: Date?
items.desc: The last time this trigger fired.

items.name: var uniqueIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for this trigger.

items.name: var actionSets: [HMActionSet]
items.desc: Array of all action sets that will be executed by the trigger.

items.name: func addActionSet(HMActionSet, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Adds an action set to the trigger.

items.name: func removeActionSet(HMActionSet, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Removes an action set from the trigger.
